Class Button

java.lang.Object
dev.gamekit.ui.widgets.Widget
dev.gamekit.ui.widgets.Parent
dev.gamekit.ui.widgets.SingleChildParent
dev.gamekit.ui.widgets.Button
All Implemented Interfaces:
InputEventHandler, NinePatch
public class Button extends SingleChildParent implements NinePatch, InputEventHandler
A Widget which can be clicked to trigger an event
